title: New Clash-Team is searching you! [Silver/Gold]
body:
Hey guys,

we are searching for the CLASH-Event a few players which are interested in having a bit fun in Teamspeak.

Skill: Silver/Gold
Teamspeak: available
Age: 25+ (yes, we are a bit older :D sry for that ^^)
Intensity: 2-3 Evenings per week
Open Roles: Mid/Top/Jungle

Looking forward to hear from you!

Best regards,
Tricar

Feel free to answer here or write me ingame.

{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

replies.body:
Ich schätze mal. dass ihr deutsch seid, weil ihr im deutschen forum postet? :D
Ich hätte Interesse; bin zur Zeit Silver 1 in SoloQ und bevorzuge Top zu spielen. 
Champion Pool ist derzeit noch ein wenig klein, aber kann man ja immer ausbauen. :)
Ingame Name: Littinger
